DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetics , safety , tolerability co-administration VCH-222 telaprevir healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study VCH-222 Telaprevir Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male , and/or healthy female nonchildbearing potential , age 18 55 year ( inclusive ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 31 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) weight > 50 kg Women child bear potential Subjects positive Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , HIV Subjects participate clinical study involve administration investigational drug within 2 month
